about_the_game:
You go to work, come home, and just sleep.

You're living those exhausting days that wear your soul down.

But one day...

"――Welcome home!"

That gentle voice welcomes you.

This is the never-ending "Days with My Sister".

Yuina (CV沢野ぽぷら)

Your cousin. She has lived near you since you were little and has taken care of you like a real sister until you got a job.

She's extremely understanding and maternal.

She'll do anything for you if it's for your sake.

She has a deep understanding of male physiology (=sexual desire).

This game is a communication game where you spend time "just" indulging in affectionate moments with the heroine, your older sister.

You can hug your sister tightly, kiss her repeatedly,

have her give you a knee pillow, and clean your ears.

You can also sleep together in one bed,

or go on outings together, like aquarium dates.

You can continue enjoying "sweet, 100% pure affection with your sister"!

Your sister is very understanding of male physiology, so she actively engages in intimate moments!

Handjobs, Nursing Handjobs, Titjobs, Blowjobs, Missionary, Doggy Style, Cowgirl, and more....

In addition to conventional scenes with text and dialogue,

there's also a command selection H system where you can control the intimate actions yourself!

Furthermore, by meeting certain conditions, you can engage in cosplay H scenes!

Your sister's dialogue also changes to match the costume she's wearing.

There are no endings in this game!

You can either become lovers with your sister and deepen your relationship or simply continue being good friends platonically.

Enjoy the sweet life with your sister that continues endlessly!

  • Ilustrations by Kaisen Chuui

  • Planning/Scenario by 4D Megane

  • Produced by Bousaba G

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, pornography, incest, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

You go to work, come home, and just sleep.

You're living those exhausting days that wear your soul down.

But one day...

"――Welcome home!"

That gentle voice welcomes you.

This is the never-ending "Days with My Sister".

Yuina (CV沢野ぽぷら)

Your cousin. She has lived near you since you were little and has taken care of you like a real sister until you got a job.

She's extremely understanding and maternal.

She'll do anything for you if it's for your sake.

She has a deep understanding of male physiology (=sexual desire).

This game is a communication game where you spend time "just" indulging in affectionate moments with the heroine, your older sister.

You can hug your sister tightly, kiss her repeatedly,

have her give you a knee pillow, and clean your ears.

You can also sleep together in one bed,

or go on outings together, like aquarium dates.

You can continue enjoying "sweet, 100% pure affection with your sister"!

Your sister is very understanding of male physiology, so she actively engages in intimate moments!

Handjobs, Nursing Handjobs, Titjobs, Blowjobs, Missionary, Doggy Style, Cowgirl, and more....

In addition to conventional scenes with text and dialogue,

there's also a command selection H system where you can control the intimate actions yourself!

Furthermore, by meeting certain conditions, you can engage in cosplay H scenes!

Your sister's dialogue also changes to match the costume she's wearing.

There are no endings in this game!

You can either become lovers with your sister and deepen your relationship or simply continue being good friends platonically.

Enjoy the sweet life with your sister that continues endlessly!

  • Ilustrations by Kaisen Chuui

  • Planning/Scenario by 4D Megane

  • Produced by Bousaba G
name: Together with Oneesan~Yuina's Sweet Encouragement~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Has lived near you since you were little, and has taken care of you like a real sister until you got a job, your cousin Yuina. Since the cohabit, you can either become lovers with your sister, or deepen your relationship. This is the never-ending "Days with My Sister".
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
